mapper.select: select b.questionid,b.questiontype,b.questioncontent,b.questionbankid,b.rightanswer,a.answerid,a.answersheetid,a.isreview,a.score,a.correct,a.respondence from ks_answer a,ks_question b where a.questionid = b.questionid and a.answersheetid = #{answerSheetID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from ks_answer where isreview = 0 and answersheetid = #{answerSheetID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select a.* from ks_answer a where a.answerid = #{answerID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
